author: mmasciov
body:
### PR description:

As per title, this PR is aimed at adding nondiagonal covariance matrix elements to scouting vertices.
This will provide additional handles for background rejection in scouting physics analyses.
It follows on the [presentation at HLT scouting meeting on Jan 19, 2024](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1366361/#5-scouting-displaced-muon-anal)
FYI: @elfontan, @CeliaFernandez
title: Add non-diagonal errors to scouting vertices
